mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.user_name as userName, t.password as password, t.last_login_time as lastLoginTime, t.last_login_ip as lastLoginIp, t.user_type as userType, t.relation_id as relationId, t.role_id as roleId, t.name as name, t.contacts_phone as contactsPhone, t.create_user as createUser, t.valid as valid, t.created as created, t.updated as updated
